data.description_html:
The subject's skin turns red and blisters.
The blisters quickly turn into oozing wounds.
Furthermore, the subject's sense of self becomes strangely clouded, diminishing her self-esteem.
The subject takes 1d6 points of Strength damage and 1d4 points of Charisma damage.
Corruption Cost: 1d6 points of Strength damage.
data.name: Red Fester
